direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the top item of the stack but with different actions (retrieval without removal vs. removal).
Both methods modify the stack by either adding or removing the top item, providing a complementary test scenario.
Both methods retrieve items from the stack but at different depths, allowing for comprehensive stack manipulation testing.
Both methods involve stack traversal and interaction, though with different outcomes (search vs. removal).
Both methods handle the EmptyStackException, providing a basis for testing exception scenarios.
The pop method internally calls remove(int), making it a direct substitutable method for testing stack removal operations.
